remarks: The norm of the difference between two vectors.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Dec-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvsub.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvsub.3 $e |- M = ( -v ` U ) $.
nvsub.6 $e |- N = ( normCV ` U ) $.
nvsub $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( N ` ( A M B ) ) = ( N ` ( B M A ) ) ) $.
